page.title: 10FOOTPATHS-BRAISHFIELD AREA
page.content: Although well signposted, most footpaths in the area have become indistinct due to lack of use. The Romsey and District Society endeavour to walk and clear the paths each year, but it has becombe a time-consuming, difficult task. 1.N.from Braishfield square-impassable beyond Merrie Mead farm. 2.N.E.from the square-very overgrown 3.E.from the square- indistinct beyond housing. 4.S.E.from Wheatsheaf P.H.-difficult to find after leaving field boundaries 5.N.from Abbotswood-in good condition until reaching fields where cattle are restricted by electric fence. 6.N.from Ampfield House to Slackstead- in good condition and well signposted a popular bridleway.
